title: [inSurance Claim] - Rejected
body:
CLAIM DETAILS
1.  Cardano (ADA) 
2.
DdzFFzCqrhsrUHQGGQiDAGuGGsJ2LiLbJY9PnAAXQv2dvGFYBkwYY4Qz5TgN37AvrqzoWFNE3HWLjphoLChirxpMEvC3464tJvJu2tN8 
(My ADA wallet on binance)

3. 28/02/2021
4. 0x498DE60ED5E9aFa201143b09EAE2EFEF89aDF20C 

5. The scammers were using a YouTube channel called ADA Foundation or Cardano Foundation, they were live with a video of Charles Hoskinson talking (he was talking in english and my english is bad), the background of the video was a website page where they promote a giveway from Cardano. All you had to do was to send them ADA and get rewarded the double.
Here their website : https://eventada.net/ 
Minutes after transfering funds to them, I realised it was a scam by doing a research, so I locked my Binance Account in order to block the transfer but it was too late. 

I've sent 14178 Cardano to them and lost all, the value was around 18000$ at that time.

TextID of the transaction : 
https://cardanoscan.io/transaction/d707fca6f16fff3dfb066b3005d431e72efb0d36db4faf4f2d3de3b272b57064 

The transaction happened on block 5400632 : 
https://cardanoscan.io/block/5400632 

Scammers wallet address :
addr1q93f8sg6fc42g0uknvleazds40vm3vyewcxggxucn2hgjwlxap7jts8kygvh08fu5v57z693uh8wsxn80wy3g9c3fzrsw7ytdw 


I hold more than 160k inSure token and I want the PRO plan insurance. 



Ps : I found your project like the Universe wanted me to see it, you're my only hope to recover my fund.

My signed message on MEW : 
{
  "address": "0x498de60ed5e9afa201143b09eae2efef89adf20c",
  "msg": "I am the holder of SURE tokens requesting inSure team to process my request:\n\n1.  Cardano (ADA) \n\n2.\nDdzFFzCqrhsrUHQGGQiDAGuGGsJ2LiLbJY9PnAAXQv2dvGFYBkwYY4Qz5TgN37AvrqzoWFNE3HWLjphoLChirxpMEvC3464tJvJu2tN8 \n(My ADA wallet on binance)\n\n3. 28/02/2021\n4. 0x498DE60ED5E9aFa201143b09EAE2EFEF89aDF20C \n\n5. The scammers were using a YouTube channel called ADA Foundation or Cardano Foundation, they were live with a video of Charles Hoskinson talking (he was talking in english and my english is bad), the background of the video was a website page where they promote a giveway from Cardano. All you had to do was to send them ADA and get rewarded the double.\nHere their website : https://eventada.net/ \nMinutes after transfering funds to them, I realised it was a scam by doing a research, so I locked my Binance Account in order to block the transfer but it was too late. \n\nI've sent 14178 Cardano to them and lost all, the value was around 18000$ at that time.\n\nTextID of the transaction : \nhttps://cardanoscan.io/transaction/d707fca6f16fff3dfb066b3005d431e72efb0d36db4faf4f2d3de3b272b57064 \n\nThe transaction happened on block 5400632 : \nhttps://cardanoscan.io/block/5400632 \n\nScammers wallet address :\naddr1q93f8sg6fc42g0uknvleazds40vm3vyewcxggxucn2hgjwlxap7jts8kygvh08fu5v57z693uh8wsxn80wy3g9c3fzrsw7ytdw \n\n\nI hold more than 160k inSure token and I want the PRO plan insurance. ",
  "sig": "0xfb4ddf597a222e0ee104e6ea5cdb33642be8194e0d86ae71c3c09690e71d135e772840c83b542830cb69ce0969b22f214cc90254ae4487d6ac3f7c206edb953d1b",
  "version": "3",
  "signer": "MEW"
}

RESOLUTION:
The insurance plan only becomes effective after 7 days the SURE tokens are placed in the private wallet. 
The SURE tokens were purchased after the incident hence the insurance plan is not applicable.
author: 0x4a30e80E9111CDacE350Fa72D011967ba9514b6B
